creator: mario@interspace.com.br
text:
My 1.3.27 apache is crashed when receive any attach, the only message in error 
log was "Client sent malformed Host header".

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
And what Host header was received (you can log it via the %{Host}i log format)?
What OS? Do you have TCP/IP filters working or something?

We need more information to track this issue. Thanks.

creator: nd@perlig.de
text:
Please reopen this bug, if you can provide the requested information.

Changing the bug status to worksforme for now (because it does ;-).

Thanks for using Apache.
